Text: i have a problem with 2 dll, msvcr100.dll and msvcp100.dll y downloaded those dll but the first give me another problem _invalid_parameter_noinfo_noreturn. how to fix this?
Well iv just learnt after some confusion that you cant just right click on one rar file to extract them all like with avi file....you must highlight all the rar files and extract. Great game tho

L2SHINOMI:
You need to install the .NET Framework 4.0 and Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable.

Download them here:
http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=17113

http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=5555

Works great, but after level 45 it says: 
"Well done, you have finished the EDGE demo."
So yeah, it's not the full game.
"_invalid_parameter_noinfo_noreturn" after installing Visual Studio Redistributable & .NET Framework 4.0 & the .dll files - any solution?
You shouldn't install the dlls seperately. What you need to do now is uninstall Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable, remove the dlls you downloaded and install Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable again.
